attributes.action: Reconsider the decision to stop Royal Brompton Hospital saving lives
attributes.additional_details:
As reported by the BBC... 

http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/health-36737265
attributes.background:
HM Government has ordered three major hospitals (Central Manchester University Hospitals NHS Trust, University Hospitals of Leicester NHS Trust and the Royal Brompton and Harefield NHS Trust) that provide complex heart care to stop doing so 
We believe this decision has NOTHING to do with standards
